title: Mean Streets (A Martin Scorsese Film)
description:
==========================================================================================================================================================================


In a series of character-led incidents set against the background of New York City's Little Italy, we follow the life of Charlie, a small-time member of the wiseguy community who collects protection money. His friends Tony and Michael are part of the community, but his other friend Johnny Boy is unreliable and therefore must be shunned. Charlie's secret girlfriend Teresa has epilepsy, and so must also be shunned.

When Charlie's uncle Giovanni offers him a restaurant - the first step up the ladder - Charlie is forced to choose between his desire for power, his love for Teresa and his duty to protect his friend Johnny Boy.


==========================================================================================================================================================================


Directed By: Martin Scorsese

MPAA: Rated " R " For Violence And Language.

Runtime: 1 Hour, 47 Minutes, 22 Seconds

Genre: Crime / Drama

Plot Keywords: Little Italy / Epilepsy / New York / New York City / Bar

Tagline: You Don't Make Up For Your Sins In Church. You Do It In The Streets...

Country: USA

Language: English

Color: Color (Technicolor)

Resolution: 608 x 336

Format: Original Widescreen Presentation ( Aspect Ratio: 1.85:1 )

Sound Mix: Mono ( AC3, 192 Kbps )

System Source: PAL Version

XviD Codec Version: 1.2.1
